body_content.explanation: a painting or drawing style in which pictures look like photographs:
examples: Even people who don't appreciate the subject matter of super-realism can appreciate the technical skill it requires.
Superrealism attempts to trick the viewer's eye.

body_content.explanation: a type of 20th-century art and literature in which unusual or impossible things are shown happening:
examples: Super-realism was trying to express something above and beyond ordinary reality.
Superrealism was inspired by Sigmund Freud's analysis of the subconscious.
